tutorial.start: Start to create your accounts, and initialize them with the current balance.
tutorial.enter_revenues: Enter your average global revenue per month
tutorial.create_categories_and_envelopes: Create your categories, and the envelopes then configure them.
tutorial.fill_envelopes: Start to fill your envelopes. After that, each month, you must to fill the envelopes with the revenue splited.
tutorial.fill_info: You have the balance to fill automatically your envelopes.
tutorial.cannot_fill_info: You don't have the balance to fill automatically your envelopes. Tou must fill them manually.
